revised_title: Additional Refractive Indices of Quartz, Vitreous Silica, Calcite, and Fluorite
tldr: This paper presents additional refractive indices of Quartz, Vitreous Silica, Calcite, and Fluorite for seven new wave-lengths, including those in the spectrum of mercury. The measurements were conducted using a specialized method and instruments, with a focus on the accuracy and precision of the results.
